column5: hey everyone, the last video I put up was dedicated to the local anglers - this is a short video of me and my lady's best catches - fish up to 33,3 for me and her PB is 27,12! she was stoked!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kZNerOlyk-U
Dude!! Nice post--those are some awesome Goldfish, Ian James would be proud.
Awesome I caught my first Carp this past summer.Hopefully i get out for mre next year.Like reeling in a Volkswagon

hey thanks, hes the fly fisherman from london no? - I just got back into fly fishing and will be targeting commons on some puke flies and cray patterns, been thinking about hooking up with him (that is of coarse if we are speaking of the same lad) - thanks for watching - shawn
Yes Shawn--the very same. He has a website Ian Colin James aka "The Carpfather" of all things...
Woa! Great recap.  I caught a few carp last summer; unfortunately I didn't have the same opportunities this year.
